text: Digaula gu hagaduu aga nadau gowaa dudu tigidaumaha ang gi Baal i di gowaa mehanga gonduu o Hinnom, belee tigidaumaha ai nadau dama daane mo nadau dama ahina ang gi di balu god go Molech. Au digi hai gi digaula gi heia di mee deelaa, gei Au digi hagamaanadu loo bolo digaula gi heia di hai deenei dela gaa hidi ai digau Judah gu i lodo di huaidu.”32.35 Leviticus 18.21; 2 Kings 23.10; Jeremiah 7.31
